meanings.definition: A type of organic compound containing a hydroxyl group and a double bond.
meanings.sent1: Propenols are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of propenols.
meanings.sent3: The propenols at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like propenols in a reaction vessel.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of propenols lingered in the lab.

meanings.sent1: The lab contained various propenols for experimentation.
meanings.sent2: The researchers analyzed the different propenols found in the samples.
meanings.sent3: The propenols on the shelf seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: The propenols in the beaker were a colorful mix of compounds.
meanings.sent5: The students learned about propenols in their chemistry class.
